name: Shadow Caster
text: Your command over shadow and darkness create longer-lasting spell effects.
benefit: When you cast spells of the shadow subschool or spells with the darkness or shadow descriptor, you are considered two levels higher when determining the duration of those spells.
text_zh: 你的命令使你创造的阴影与黑暗法术效果更加持久。
benefit_zh: 当你释放的法术为阴影子学派（shadow subschool）或带有黑暗或阴影描述符（darkness or shadow descriptor），在决定这些法术的持续时间时视为你的施法者等级比正常高2级。
